query:
mutation ($input0:UpdateHackerReportTemplateInput!) {
		updateHackerReportTemplate(input:$input0) {
			clientMutationId,
			hacker_report_template {
				attack_complexity,
				attack_vector,
				availability,
				body,
				confidentiality,
				cwe,
				id,
				impact,
				integrity,
				privileges_required,
				rating,
				scope,
				score,
				severity,
				title,
				user_interaction,
			},
			was_successful,
		}
	}
